name: Travesty of a Thespian
description:
Created for MoonJam 2022 Q2 Jam. One brave thespian, Billy Shakespeare, is tired of tragedies and seeks to stop them.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Cursor to aim, left click to fire gun

- Right click to phantom dash

- Left shift to briefcase bash

Contributors:

Made by eddrw, broncoxll, upperlips, kyhaii, mcat19, cornercasecoder
